This website features a delicious recipe for "Melt in Your Mouth Potatoes," where thick potato slices are roasted in butter and herbs, then cooked in chicken broth and garlic. Users can also find more potato recipes, tips for choosing and storing potatoes, and other tasty potato side dishes like Easy Lemon Herb Potatoes and Cheesy Lemon Parsley Potatoes. It's a great resource for anyone looking to add a flavorful potato side dish to their meals.
